features: Wear around your neck, forming a microscopic health shield of good air in public places or in other poor air quality locations
Ideal for those with allergies, compromised immune systems, asthma, other breathing sensitivities
Provides 48 hours continuous out-put of 10 million purifying negative ion per second at the press of a button
Negative ions attach like magnets to airborne , viruses, smoke, pollen, mites even PM2.5 air pollutants – sinking them to the ground
Perfect for cold and flu season. A natural and safe way to overall well-being. Lightweight, quiet and discreet.
body.description: The Personal Air Purifier a must-have, especially during these difficult times. It radiates a 6-foot orbit of safer clean air creating a sphere of protection. Take it on the go, it’s the perfect travel accessory for those who love to explore without exposure to unsanitary air. Includes a safety breakaway lanyard. Wear it around your neck and always have a sphere of breathable clean air anywhere you go. Put it on your nightstand for clean air as you sleep.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Travelon Personal Air Purifier Clean Air The Personal Air Purifier a must-have, especially during these difficult times. It radiates a 6-foot orbit of safer clean air creating a sphere of protection against harmful airborne viruses, bacteria, smoke, mites, pollen, and pollutants. Take it on the go, it’s the perfect travel accessory for those who love to explore without exposure to unsanitary air. Includes a safety breakaway lanyard. Wear it around your neck and always have a sphere of breathable clean air anywhere you go. Put it on your nightstand for clean air as you sleep. Live Well A natural and safe way to overall well-beingSanitizes the air around you, so you can breathe safe and fresh air. You'll smell the difference.Perfect for flu season and ideal for those with allergies, compromised immune systems, asthma, and other breathing sensitivities.Wear around your neck, forming a microscopic health shield of good air in public places or in other poor air quality locations Negative Ion Technology Provides 48 hours continuous out-put of 10 million purifying negative ion per second at the press of a buttonNegative ions attach like magnets to airborne bacteria, viruses, smoke, pollen, mites even PM2.5 air pollutants – sinking them to the groundLightweight, quiet, and discreetRecharges in one hour. 5 volt USB adapter and comfort lanyard are included.

About Travelon About Travelon Travelon is more than a name, it is a call to go further, see more, and have better travel experiences. With Travelon products you’ll travel fearlessly and easier. What We Believe When travel goes right, you see the world, connect and build social relationships, discover opportunities to learn and grow, or have the chance to develop new skills and immerse yourself in other cultures. When travel goes right, it brings us closer to ourselves and others. So, go further, see more, and have better experiences – when you pack your journey with the peace-of-mind that comes with any Travelon product. Who We Are It is the spirit of innovation that permeates the Travelon culture and makes it “the go-to brand” for travel accessories. Product innovation is what really excites us – and what sets us apart. So much so that Travelon has been awarded over 130 patents to date. Through innovation combined with a dogged pursuit of excellence, Travelon products have raised industry standards. Access is the Key to a Better World Through the Kids Wheelchair Network, Travelon contributes the means to support thousands of disabled kids with wheelchairs and receive critical wheelchair fittings. Travelon also contributes the means that helps to bring Adaptive Adventure opportunities to the adult disabled community, including veterans. “It is about freedom through mobility.” Travelon Founder and CEO states, “It is part of Travelon’s DNA to strongly support members of the disabled community.”

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought as a gift
reviews.reviewText: My sister is going to Bali, Indonesia, we went 10 years ago and each had one, time for a new one she loves it!! No sound like the old ones. Made with new technology

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used mine for over a year now. I feel good about wearing this while not needing a mask.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They should let you know that you get zapped. I thought there was something poking me but it was the air purifier. Yikes. Not good to have a kid use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is not a bulky monstrosity to wear. Warning don’t touch both the black nubs you’ll get an electrifying experience. No idea if works as there is no way to tell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor quality and performance
reviews.reviewText: Product does not do anything or help at all

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Travelon air purifier
reviews.reviewText: My travelon air purifier is wonderful; I use it everywhere! Its lightweight, charges easily, and very easy to turn in and off! I've already told a few people I know about this item.....they are looking into it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars It shocks me!
reviews.reviewText: Particularly in the gym while working out- the main reason I bought it- it shocks me! Not a enough to cry out, but it definitely gets my attention. I had an air tamer that did not do this. I’m going to have to return this. It may work- which is important- but this thing is “shockingly” uncomfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A principio no se quedaba enchufado, pero ahora si. Pensé que no había cargado, pero cuando apreté el botón duro, volvía a aprender.
